The street itself is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. They stand tall, providing a natural canopy over the road. On the right side of the street, there are buildings visible, their details slightly obscured by the distance and the angle of the shot.

The road itself is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, giving it a serene and peaceful ambiance. The absence of any human activity suggests a quiet, early morning or late evening moment in the city.

Overall, the image presents a harmonious blend of urban architecture and natural elements, typical of a cityscape in Beijing.
